def maxScoreWithoutElimination(scores, threshold):
    n = len(scores)
    dp = [0] / n
    dp[0] = scores[0]
    dp[1] = scores[1]
    max_score = max(dp[0], dp[1])
    for i in range(2, n):
        dp[i] = max(scores[i], max_score + scores[i])
        max_score = max(max_score, dp[i])
    return max_score if max_score <= threshold else max_score - threshold
